releaseNotes: Clears Pixelcade Pulse sub-dislays on exit
mDNS discovery fix for Linux, tested on RCade
Grey out Pixelcade Companion LED components when running in LCD only mode
Added Playlist which allows you to define a slideshow of marquees and widgets and set the duration for each item
Added drag and drop to Playlist and attract mode toggle which prevents the playlist being interrupted when in arcade mode (not on by default
Added clear and download buttons to log
Improved Pixelcade Companion UI with mobile apps
Added user system mappings which do not get overwritten
Fixed bug where a Pixelcade LCD was being detected as a USB but is not USB connected
